title: Apple faces class action in France from music streaming users
subhead: A French consumer advocacy group has taken legal action, arguing that Apple's fees have 'driven up' the price of subscriptions to music streaming services.

title: French authorities allow drug trafficker day release from supermax prison
subhead: The prisoner was expected to travel by train – unescorted – to the eastern city of Lyon for a meeting with a prospective employer. The decision to grant him leave has fueled outrage.

title: Why Grok is first and foremost a disinformation machine
subhead: Grok, the chatbot that has been integrated into the X social network and aims to rival ChatGPT, has recently spread Holocaust denial and false information about the November 2015 attacks in France. It was a reminder that Elon Musk's tool, far from being neutral, was designed to misinform.

title: Five winter walks by the sea in France
subhead: Le Monde is taking you on a trip. Let's go to the island of Ouessant, Argelès, Lacanau, Saint-Malo and Mont-Saint-Michel, popular destinations for summer visitors, but just as attractive in winter. And you will (almost) be the only ones to enjoy it.
byline: By Yoanna Sultan-R'bibo and Anne-Lise Carlo

title: Niklas Frank, a son consumed by hatred for his Nazi father
subhead: Niklas Frank, an 86-year-old former journalist, is known in Germany for his absolute loathing of his father. As a Reich official, Hans Frank, appointed by Hitler in Poland, was among those sentenced to death at the Nuremberg trials, which began 80 years ago.
byline: By Elsa Conesa (Ecklak (Schleswig-Holstein, Germany), special correspondent)
